title: The Secret Art for Live’s Success! Finally!
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Kukuku..... Today is the day it shall be done. The secret technique of me and my little demons, the summoning ritual of the demon dragon from the darkness!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Wow! Come to think of it, we didn’t get to do it last time because we fell asleep~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Was it the one that required something creepy?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Umm, if I remember correctly, it needs.... Some kind of bone?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>There was also something about the leftovers of a dwarf, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I think she said she needed Ruby’s tears too. I definitely won’t allow that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Onee-chan....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>What was the last thing again? Uhh.... The wings of a cicada?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>If those are all it takes, then the dragon seems kind of weak zura....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Come on! You guys didn’t remember anything at all! Listen, alright? The ritual needs a fire dragon’s breath, a gnome’s beard, a unicorn’s....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>A unicorn’s what?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>....Zzz.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ah, she fell asleep.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>No secret art this time too, huh? That’s a shame~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Let’s do our best and make up for the lack of Yoshiko’s secret art! I can’t wait to see everyone!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
